entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 20.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Friday 12 May 2023
